overview: A person, a house moving, a city. The film is, in a way, the memory of a journey and a transition. This is the recording of how Jon Ander, born in Bermeo and used to the countryside life, decides to move to Bilbao and establish a relation with the city from his home. A small story to immerse ourselves in the idea that individual normality is a fabricated idea, as happens with traditions, systems and cities.
title: Harria eta bidea
